choices: Strip him naked at his locker
11111.content: What does John do to Adam?
11111.title: John

111112.content:
Adam hurried through the crowd, trying to look everywhere at once. Bullies were everywhere. He made it to his locker without incident, which was rare, and quickly put his stuff in there.

He rushed away just in time to see Josh running with somebody's pants and quickly stood back, trying to stay out of the way. Luckily Josh didn't notice him. Sighing with relief, he stepped forward...only to suddenly find himself in a headlock.

"Check it out, ladies! A nerd in his natural habitat!" To Adam's horror, John's voice was filled with delight. He tried to struggle, but it was no use; John held him tightly.

"So let's see what he's got today! Will he be wearing boxers finally, or is he sticking with tightie whities? Let's find out! Drumroll!" The sound of hands drumming on locker doors rang out. Next thing you know, John reached down and grabbed his waistband. Adam braced himself.

"And the prize goes to...tightie whities!" John pulled so hard Adam went up onto his toes, squealing.

John swung him around and began using Adam as a weight, doing arm curls and bouncing him up and down.
111112.title: Wedgie Time

11121.content: Nicki has had a crush on Atam for a while now she found his dorky nerdy ness cute and found his embarrassment adorable, she ever embarrasses him just to see his cute reactions. She was walking down the halls when she saw Atam, she then got a idea, she walked up behind reached into his pants grabbed the waistband and yanked them hard making them reacher the top of his neck, lifting him off the ground, and making him bend forward having him at a right angle,” eek,” Atam squeaked. Nicki watched as he squirmed she started walking, got out side, and hook Atams undies to the flag pole, where some jocks were hanging out they saw her hanging Atam and saw her hot pink bikini panties sticking out they snuck behind her, flipped her skirt, wedgied her, and put her on the same hook as Atam the jocks they hoisted them both to the top. They were both blushing at themselves, and each other. Nicki wasn’t used to this like Atam was, so it hurt a little more, she looked over to Atam then behind her, unlike him her butt was exposed, so she reached over and pulled down his pants,”what the heck I’m already in enough humiliation I don’t need more,” he said blushing hard then before,” I was putting us on the same level those guys made my butt exposed, so I exposed yours,” she replied pinching Atams butt in punishment,”eek,” Nicki got one more idea, she leaned toward Atom and kissed his cheek, and their backs then straightened out making them sink into their undies more, they then reached behind the other grabbed the middle string, and pulled at the same time,” eeeeek,” squealed at the same time,” your so cute Atom,”,” your cute to Nicki. They hung there till lunch, and excepting their fate then someone brought them down.
11121.title: Nicki

choices: Daniel chases Josh to get his pants back
Daniel looks for his gym shorts in his locker
11312.content:
Daniel walked languidly to his locker, brushing his dark hair out of his eyes. Bullies or not, it wasn't Goth to hurry.

He opened the locker and put away his jacket and most of his books, saving the one he needed for his first class. He was just grabbing the proper binder when it happened: hands gripped his pants and pulled them down.

Spinning around in annoyance, he found Josh grinning at him. "Hey, goth boy, how're the forces of dorkdom today?"

"Leave me alone!" Daniel snapped, reaching for his pants. That was a mistake, because Josh grabbed him and pulled him forward, sending him sprawling on the ground. Leaping on top of him, Josh grabbed his black boxer-briefs and pulled hard, giving him a major wedgie.

Finally, he grabbed Daniel's pants and managed to get them off his feet. As Daniel scrambled, Josh took off laughing with his pants. A cheerleader followed him, laughing hysterically.

Daniel forced himself to his feet as the crowd laughed and applauded him.
11312.title: Josh

choices: Runs for a bathroom or locker room
Someone else decides to have some fun at his expense
113121.content:
"Hey! Give those back!" Daniel yells as he chases after Josh, tying to pull his shirt down a little to cover his boxers, the crowd laughs as he runs pantsless, a few even follow after the embarrassed goth

Josh smirks and makes sure to run down the most crowded hallways he can find, and stupidly Daniel keeps chasing him, Traci a cheerleader kept following Josh as well, she was loving every minute of this.

Josh ducks behind a corner and waits, as soon as Daniel runs past, Josh grabs his shirt from behind and pulls it over his head and off and gives him another huge wedgie, before running off again, this time with his pants and shirt.

"Keep following us loser and we might all see what you have underneath those!" Traci says laughing and running after Josh

Daniel...
113121.title: Daniel chases Josh to get his pants back

choices: He leaves the locker room and goes for the lost and found instead
1131212.content:
Daniel froze. Ok...he was in school in his underwear. This was a nightmare and he'd wake up soon. He closed his eyes really hard, then opened them wide.

Nope, still there. The crowd was still laughing and he was in his boxer-briefs.

After a moment, he ran. He raced forward, looking for anywhere to hide, and raced without thinking into the locker room. The door slammed shut behind him.

Daniel looked around frantically, trying to catch his breath. Ok...ok. This could be worse. With any luck there would be clothes in one of the lockers he could steal. He began frantically tugging at them and looking under the benches, hoping against hope to find some clothes so he could cover up.

He took a deep breath in and out. The bell rang, making him freeze. Oh no. He did NOT want to be caught like this when the first class came in!
1131212.title: Runs for a bathroom or locker room

choices: They're his (they were stolen the other day)
11312121.content:
"Stupid Josh, I'll get him for this" he says to himself as he looks around for something to wear.

Daniel checks locker after locker they're all locked, until...he finally finds an unlocked one and it has clothes inside!

"Yes!" Daniel says to himself excitedly, but he looks at the clothes nervously, he is one of the taller students in the school, but also very skinny, its hard to find clothes that fit him just right, he takes the clothes out and inspects them, he recognizes them they belong to...
11312121.title: Daniel finds clothes

choices: He goes to the lost and found to find clothes that fit better
He goes home to get new clothes
He goes to class in Adam's clothes
113121211.content:
Daniel gritted his teeth in annoyance. These were definitely Adam's clothes. Daniel wondered vaguely if he had taken them off willingly this time.

A search of the lockers didn't offer anything else. Daniel stared at the clothes; Adam was a complete nerd and a lot smaller than him, so these wouldn't fit, but on the other hand he couldn't stay like this the entire day.

After a moment, he tried pulling the pants on. They were way too small and ridiculously tight on him; he couldn't get them up fully. He strained for a minute, and managed to get them ALMOST up to his waist. He tried on the shirt, and luckily he was skinny enough that he could get it on; it was really tight though. He stared in the mirror; he looked worse than a conformist, he looked like a complete tool.

He sighed. His only real choice at this point was to either live with it or go in his underwear. At least he was mostly covered up now.

With no other options, he left the locker room dressed in Adam's clothes.
113121211.title: Nerd Adam (too small)

choices: He goes to lost and found (the goths see him)
1131212111.content:
"I can't be seen this way" he says to himself as he decides to head to the lost and found and hopefully find something that fits a little better.

He walks carefully, he really hopes no one sees him dressed like this, he peeks around every corner, and gets most of the way to the office without anyone seeing him.

But when he gets to the last corner, he peeks around and sees a group of goths.

"Noooo they can't see me like this" he says to himself in a panic

He has to make a decision he could walk the rest of the way to the office and be seen by the goths, or he could turn around and hide in the bathroom until they leave.

He feels the pants strain a little

"Oh please don't rip!!" He hopes
1131212111.title: He goes to the lost and found to find clothes t...

11312121113.content:
For a single, desperate moment, it felt like the pants would obey him. Then, with a loud tearing sound, they almost exploded off of him. Daniel gritted his teeth as he once again found himself without pants.

"What was that?"

His eyes widened. Crap, the other goths had heard the ripping. In a panic, he ducked around the corner; unfortunately the shirt was so tight on him that he couldn't pull it down any more. He tried to take it off to wrap around him, but it got stuck; he was trapped with the shirt over his head and he couldn't get his arms down. He was stuck, blindfolded, and in his underwear.
11312121113.title: The pants rip

1131212112.content:
He decides to go home and get more clothes ...it isn't goth to be seen like this.

He cautiously leaves the locker room and heads to the main entrance.

So far no one has seen him, he walks carefully because the pants could tear at any moment.

He heads out the door...

"Daniel?" He hears a familiar voice

"Oh no..." daniel blushes and turns around to see
1131212112.title: He goes home to get new clothes

choices: Alonzo takes the shirt and pants off Daniel
Alonzo decides to hunt down Adam and taunt him instead
11312121121.content:
"Hey Alonzo." He said weakly.

Alonzo's eyebrows raised as he studied the other boy. "Interesting new look."

Daniel blushed. "Yeah, I'm going home to change."

Alonzo grinned. "What happened to you? What are you wearing that?"

Daniel filled him in on the whole story.

"So these are Adam's clothes?"

"Yeah."

Alonzo's eyes sparkled. "That's not nice, stealing his clothes."

"It wasn't nice for them to steal mine."
11312121121.title: Alonzo

choices: Josh is waiting to humiliate him again
He gets caught by somebody else
Daniel makes it to lunch without further incident
113121214.content:
"Yes!" He whispered in triumph, staring at his clothes from a few days before. He found his own clothes; it was kind of sad how relieved he was about that.

Dressing quickly, he left the locker room, looking around anxiously, just avoiding the next class coming in as he headed to his first class. His classmates all snickered as he came in; obviously they had all seen him in his underwear, but at least he was wearing clothes again.

"Hey." He looked up in annoyance to see Josh staring down at him. "I don't remember telling you that you could get dressed again."

"You can't imagine how little I care." Daniel answered flatly, trying to keep his goth iciness from showing how nervous he was.

Luckily class started at that point. Josh sat down as they did their work. Daniel carefully avoided looking at him; with any luck Josh would forget about him and focus on somebody else. Maybe he was satisfied for now.

When the bell rang at the end of class, Daniel deliberately took a minute to get ready, letting Josh leave the room before him.
113121214.title: They're his (they were stolen the other day)

choices: It's josh ready for round two
A Nerd accidentally spilled their drink on him
1131212143.content:
Daniel was able to avoid Josh and other bullies for the rest of the morning and made it to lunch without anything else happening, he had almost started to forget about his embarrassment earlier today.

Daniel sat down at the goth table at started eating his lunch, as each goth sat down, Daniel would give them a small nod, and they would in turn give him one.

"Did you guys see that dork get wedgied all the way down the hall earlier?" a girl goth named Bethany said excitedly, before suddenly getting serious again..."I mean...whatever"

The other goths nod, and smirk a little

"I think its time the goths get a new reputation, I say before lunch is over we pants a nerd" Alonzo says, to nods of approval

Suddenly a cold drink gets dumped on Daniel's head

Daniel can't help but shriek at the shock of the cold liquid, he stands up and turns around to see who dumped their drink on him....
1131212143.title: Daniel makes it to lunch without further incident

choices: Daniel tells them to let Adam go
Josh and John come after both Daniel and Adam
The other goths strip Adam naked
11312121433.content:
"Oh! Oh crap, I'm sorry!" Adam looked horrified as he quickly began handing Daniel napkins.

"Oh, you're going to be." Alonzo growled.

"It was an accident!" Adam protested.

"Yeah, so is this!" Alonzo grabbed Adam's pants and pulled them down to his ankles.

Adam quickly grabbed his pants and tried to pull them up, but Alonzo pulled his shirt over his head. "Nobody messes with the goth kids!"

As Adam struggled, Daniel was still drying himself off. Alonzo looked at him. "You want to do anything else to him?"
11312121433.title: A Nerd accidentally spilled their drink on him

choices: Throw him back in the hall
11312122.content:
He curses Josh as he starts to look around the locker room, this wasn't fair he wasn't supposed to be then one embarrassed in his underwear, he had hoped to humiliate a nerd today.

He checked locker after locker, but they were all either locked or empty.

"Dammit!" He yells

"What was that?" A voice said

Daniel froze and blushed, oh no, a class is coming in!

"Did you see that stupid goth get stripped to his boxers?" A guy asks another

"Yeah, that's almost as funny as the dork that's hanging on the flagpole" the other guy says as they get closer to Daniel.

Daniel freaks out and tries to hide in a locker, but he is way too tall, so he runs for a stall...

"Hey! There he is!" A guy says pointing to him and they run after him.

Daniel almost makes it to the stall, but is grabbed by his waistband just before he can.

"Well, well someone is having a rough day, huh?" A bully asks

"Shut up, and let me go" Daniel says in his most threatening voice

The guys laugh at him

"What should we do with you?" They ask
11312122.title: A class finds him

choices: Somebody comes in and finds him
113121223.content:
"Let's hang him up!"

"No!" Daniel ran around the room, trying to avoid the charging class, but the boys cornered him easily. Grabbing him, they dragged him forward and grabbed his waistband, lifting him into the air.

"AAAHHH!" Daniel wailed. Laughing, the class managed to hook his waistband over one of the locker doors, then closed and locked it; he dangled helplessly in the air. They laughed and cheered.

Daniel stared helplessly as they all changed, laughing at him the entire time and deliberately showing him all the clothes available before leaving for gym class.
113121223.title: Hang him up somewhere

choices: Somehow his underwear is intact, but he's stuck...
1131212231.content:
Daniel struggles to get free, he bounces himself a little, it hurts and makes the wedgie worse, but hopefully it well help him get free...

It doesn't seem to be working, but Daniel just keeps trying and trying, and finally after several minutes he falls to the ground free from his wedgie.

He doesn't know how or why it even worked, but he is glad it did, now he can steal someone's clothes and put this humiliation behind him.

Suddenly, he realizes
1131212231.title: Daniel manages to get down

choices: Daniel goes for the clothes in his locker
Daniel steals the other clothes, puts on anything that fits, and leaves school
11312122311.content:
Daniel stared unhappily at the ruins of his underwear still on the wall. He grabbed them and threw them in the garbage. Well, that sucked.

He looked around the room. He was too tall for most of the clothes that would be in here, but he might be able to get to his locker and get his own gym clothes, at least he would be covered up then.

His eyes flew over the various clothes left out; he was tempted to steal all their clothes anyways for revenge. With luck he could find one or two things that would fit him and he could just leave school.
11312122311.title: His underwear ripped...he's naked!!

choices: The jocks come for both of them
113122.content:
Daniel stared unhappily as Josh took off with his pants. Doing his best to ignore the laughing crowd, he turned back to his locker. He was sure he had gym shorts in there somewhere.

As he rooted around, hoping they weren't in the laundry, Daniel silently called upon the spirit of Edgar Allan Poe. The patron saint of goths never had to deal with crap like this!

Suddenly a hand grabbed his waistband and gave Daniel a major wedgie. Daniel yelped and turned, ready for a fight, but nodded at the sight of his fellow goth. "Hey Alonzo."

"Daniel." Alonzo studied his friend with a sigh. Not that he minded picking on Daniel sometimes, but the guys at school took it to an extreme. "Already?"

"It started early today." Daniel brushed the bangs out of his hair and kept searching. "I'm sure I have my gym shorts somewhere."

"Here." Alonzo pointed to a piece of fabric sticking out being some textbooks. Daniel grabbed them gratefully.

"Thanks." He pulled on the shorts; he looked ridiculous, but at least he wasn't in his underwear anymore. "I hope I find my pants soon."

"You better, or I'm giving you another wedgie." Daniel wasn't sure if he was kidding or not.
113122.title: Daniel looks for his gym shorts in his locker

choices: Take her clothes from her locker after gym
12112.content: What does Erica do to her?
12112.title: Erica

121122.content: Nicki was walking down the halls when she sees her favourite target and secret crush Atam, she love that boy and thinks it’s cute when he’s embarrassed, sometimes she embarrasses him to get his attention, or have herself be embarrassed. She then realized she had stared into space allowing Erica to sneak behind her, flip her skirt, and grab her pink bikini panties,” WEDGIE geek,” Nicki squealed,” EEEEEEEEEPP,” everyone turned to her and laughed as her panties reached the back of her head,” time to hang you up pinky,” Erica said while Nicki blushed a deep pink as she saw Atam giggling a bit. Erica then hung her up by the leg holes, and laughed before walking away. Atam then came over,” hey need some help,” he offered nervously,” yeah but if you wish feel free to take one picture,” Atam immediately took a picture of his crush hanging by her panties. He helped her down, and said,” your look cute like that,” Nicki blushed,” well if you want you can come over to my place and hang out,” she offered Atam nodded his head instantly and she walked off to class picking her wedgie.

12211.content:
John embarrasses Andrew one day after gym class. He not only steals his personal belongs, his clothes and shoes, but even every towel in the locker room. Andrew is forced to walk to his next class buck naked covering his manhood with his hands. His tender, tan bare feet with pedicured, slender toes react on every pebble or object in the path he walks. Andrew has a well built and tan body with a tan, hairless chest with six pack abs.
He arrives to his science class and the teacher quickly hands Andrew a lab coat to cover himself. Andrew walks barefoot to his lab chair, sitting carefully on the stool with his bare feet on the cold floor.

Josh and his good friend Spencer make fun of Andrew's bare feet saying that his feet are big and his toes are very long. Andrew wiggles his toe at them and laughs. He says "The doc says I have normal size bare feet and I keep them in fine shape."
Spencer replies "Oh my feet look better than yours...(slips off shoes and peels off his socks revealing two golden tan, unblemished, hairless bare feet with pedicured toes), what do you think?" Spencer splays his toes making his nearby classmates nearly faint.
The instructor pipes in "Spencer, put your shoes and socks back on. They're stinkin' up the place!" Spencer replies "Oh can't I just leave them off for now. My toes love being free (wiggles them again)."
The instructor throws him a can of foot spray which Spencer sprays on his bare feet and says "Thanks teach!"

Spencer tells Josh to show Andrew his special toes. Josh smiles and slips off his Vans and ankle socks revealing his smooth, tan and hairy bare feet. His pedicured toes look exquisite except that his right pinkie toe is webbed together with his fourth toe. On his left bare foot, Josh's big toe is unusually longer than normal and his second and third toe are webbed together. Josh splays all of them and sighs. Spencer throws him the foot spray saying "Woah Josh, when did you last wash your feet?"
Josh replies "About two or three weeks, I mean days ago". Spencer sprays some deodorant on them to cover up the smell.
Andrew looks down at them and then at his own bare feet and says "Josh, you sure have some hairy bare feet and interesting toes".
All three bare foot boys take a seat as the class continues.

info.brief_description: A Bunch of High school students get embarrassed
info.description:
In this story several High school students find themselves in embarrassing situations, This is an embarrassment story, not a sex story. Nudity is allowed, sex is not, mild violence is, major violence is not. Pantsing, Swirlies, Wedgies, etc are all encouraged, please keep people peeing themselves to a minimum.

These are the characters for the story

Victims:

Adam- A sophomore nerd who is terrible at sports, not strong, not fast, he has been getting pantsed and wedgied since kindergarten and there is no sign of an end to the embarrassment, he is picked on at home by his three siblings and at school. Adam is relatively tall, pale, and pasty, he has brown hair and blue eyes. Adam can wear tighty whiteys, boxer briefs, boxers, or colored briefs (including superhero), but usually he wears tighty whiteys No panties, or girls underwear. He is usually regarded as the biggest nerd in the school and the most likely to strung up the flagpole or worse tied to the bottom of it naked, bullies have stopped tormenting other nerds to go after Adam before.

Justine- A Sophomore dork, she is short, hot headed and her mouth tends to get her in trouble, she has a bit of an attitude and will insult anyone, even the jocks and cheerleaders who have tormented her since sixth grade. She has blonde hair, green eyes, is slightly less than average at sports. She can wear bikini panties or boyshorts. She tends to wear skinny jeans, a tank top and a hoodie.

Daniel- A Junior Goth- Despite being rather tall, somewhere around 6'4:" he is picked on fairly frequently, it doesn't help his cause that his pants fall down almost as much as they get pulled down. He wears only boxers or boxer briefs usually dark in color, He Has Long black hair, and brown eyes.

Sara- A Freshman Nerd, she is a major nerd and because of that she gets picked a lot, more than anybody...except for Adam, She has brown hair, green eyes, she is not athletic at all, possibly even worse than Adam, She is a little bit pudgy, with pale pasty skin. She is mostly picked on by the cheerleaders, and popular girls. She wears Granny panties or boyshorts only, she is more likely to get pantsed than wedgied, but can get either one frequently.

The Bullies Please note in this story the bullies have the upper hand for most of the story, nerds can get revenge, but it must be short lived)

John- A Sophomore, John is cool, he is athletic, stylish, trendy and a chick magnet, girls are always around him. He has never been pantsed or wedgied, he torments nerds on a daily basis, especially Adam, he really likes to pants them or wedgie them in front of girls. He wears boxers, and humiliates anyone who wears briefs. He has short blonde hair and green eyes

Evelina-A Sophomore, She is the most popular girl in school, and she is gorgeous and she knows it, she has never had a fashion misstep, she has never had a pimple, she is athletic and smart. With dark skin, a perfect Hourglass figure she rules the school hallways, nobody messes with her, she loves embarrassing nerds, and laughing at them when other people embarrass them, she especially likes to humiliate Adam or Sara. Evelina wears thongs or G Strings. She has black hair and blue eyes

Josh- A Sophomore Jock- He is the star football player...and basketball...and baseball player, he is always with a girl, usually a cheerleader. He has always been cooler than other guys, stronger and faster. He likes to embarrass nerds and goths, He wears boxers and sags his pants. He has brown hair and hazel eyes

Erica- A Senior Cheerleader- The most feared pantser in the school, she is the head cheerleader, and she is also the meanest, She has always been popular has never been picked on by anyone, she is beautiful, big breasted, she usually wears short shorts or mini skirts to show off her booty. She wears thongs, G Strings or boyshorts, and will embarrass anyone who crosses her. She has blonde hair and blue eyes

The InBetweeners (These are people that can either get embarrassed or be the embarrasser, they are popular, but not that popular)

Nicki- A Sophomore- Adam's next door neighbor and crush, she has blonde hair, green eyes, an average build bodywise, she is okay at sports, but not a jock by any means. She likes to embarrass people, especially Adam and Justine, although she has had her share of embarrassing moments as well. She wears Jeans or skirts, bikini panties or thongs only.

Andrew- A Sophomore- Adam's best friend, he is athletic and plays football, although he has never been fully accepted by the other players and is not considered a jock, he helps Adam out of embarrassing predicaments when he can, he doesn't embarrass anyone, other than for revenge, he doesn't get picked on very often, but does occasionally get a wedgie or pantsed

Becky- A Senior Cheerleader- Adam's Oldest Sister, although she is a cheerleader she is not as popular as the rest of them, she is also mot considered to be as pretty, she has an average build and like her brother is not at all athletic. She has brown hair and brown eyes, she absolutely loves tormenting her younger brother, she is however tormented by other cheerleaders and jocks. She wears jeans or pajama pants, and wears granny panties, bikini panties or boyshorts only.

Alonzo- A Senior Goth- Not particularly athletic, not bad at sports, Not great at school, not bad at school either, he sometimes picks on a nerd, or fellow goth, he fears jocks...and cheerleaders, because where there is a cheerleader, there is probably a jock. He wears boxers, boxer briefs or dark colored briefs on a rare occasion. He has black hair and blue eyes.
